title: 2/bd 1/ba, Built-in linen closet, Located in Redmond
posting_body: Enjoy the conveniences and flexibility of an active adult lifestyle in Redmond, WA.
Specifically designed for those 55 and better, Reunion at Redmond Ridge is a truly modern living experience with an inspired suite of amenities.

-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity
-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
-Open green space with mini golf course and recreational games available                                                                                         Featured amenity
-Close proximity to hiking and biking trails
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
